skills.desc:
Removes all [Increase DEF] buffs from all enemies, then attacks all enemies. 

Decreases the cooldown of Lay Bare by 1 turn for each enemy killed by this skill.
skills.name: Lay Bare
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +10%
